title: Assassins Creed Chronicles China-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Assassins Creed Chronicles: China (c) Ubisoft Entertainment
Release Date: 04/2015 Protection: uPlay
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

Follow three legendary Assassins on journeys of Revenge
Retribution and Redemption A thrilling new saga in the Assassins
Creed Universe, Assassins Creed Chronicles take players to three
distinct civilizations and time periods throughout history: the
start of the Ming Dynasty crumble, the Sikh Empire going at war in
India and the aftermath of Red October revolution

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Notes: start the game from shortcut or included launcher:

ACCGame-Win32-Shipping.launcher.exe

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS
02/2015


System Requirements:


OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8 or Windows 8.1 (32/64bit versions) 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 @ 2.6 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTS450 or AMD Radeon HD5770 (1024MB VRAM with Shader 
Model 5.0) 
DirectX: Version 10
